00053 #define APT_ERR_ABORT(_Why) { Err::apt_err_abort(__FILE__,__LINE__,_Why); }
00056 // this could be cleaned up to avoid the "0".
00057 #define APT_ERR_ASSERT(_Cond,_Msg) { if (!(_Cond)) { Err::apt_err_assert(__FILE__,__LINE__,#_Cond,0,_Msg); } }

00063 class APTLIB_API Err {
00064 
00065  public: 
00067   class Param {
00068     public:
00070     Param() {
00071       VerboseErrHandler *handler = new VerboseErrHandler();
00072       m_ErrHandlers.push_back(handler);
00073       m_NewLineOnError = true;
00074     }
00075     
00077     ~Param() { 
00078       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_ErrHandlers.size(); i++) {
00079         delete m_ErrHandlers[i];
00080       }
00081     }
00082 
00083     std::vector<ErrHandler *> m_ErrHandlers; 
00084     bool m_NewLineOnError; 
00085   };
00086     
00092   static Param &getParam();
00093 
00099   static void errAbort(const std::string &msg, const std::string prefix = "FATAL ERROR: ");
00100 
00105   static void pushHandler(ErrHandler *handler);
00106 
00111   static ErrHandler *popHandler();
00112 
00122   inline static void check(bool passed, const char *msg) {
00123     if(!passed) {
00124       errAbort(msg);
00125     }
00126   }
00127 
00134   inline static void check(bool passed, const std::string &msg) {
00135     if(!passed) {
00136       errAbort(msg);
00137     }
00138   }
00139 
00145   static void setThrowStatus(bool doThrow);
00146 
00153   static void configureErrHandler(bool doThrow, bool verbose);

00171                              const std::string& msg);
